forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy early, then off and on rain showers for the afternoon. High 8C. Winds ESE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional showers this afternoon. High 46F. Winds E at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 70%.
